mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cartno, menuno, memberno, cnt, rdate) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{menuno}, #{memberno}, #{cnt}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartno, c.menuno, m.name, m.photo, m.price, m.dc, m.saleprice, m.point, c.memberno, c.cnt, (m.saleprice * c.cnt) AS tot, c.rdate FROM cart c JOIN menu m ON c.menuno = m.menuno WHERE c.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY c.cartno ASC
